summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Raymond Street from 51st Avenue South to 51st Place South; and certain other streets, avenues, alleys and easements; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 17783 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improving be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
